markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Freeze Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1898)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 28 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Freeze ammunition carries chilling reagents that activate on contact with the target. A creature hit by activated freeze ammunition takes cold damage instead of the weapon's normal damage type, plus 2 cold splash damage. Hitting a 5-foot-square surface successfully with freeze ammunition deals 2 cold splash damage and covers the space in a layer of ice. Each creature standing on the icy surface must succeed at a DC 20 Reflex save or [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check or else fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). Creatures using an action to move onto the icy surface must attempt either a Reflex save or an Acrobatics check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28). Creatures that Step or [Crawl](/Actions.aspx?ID=76) don't need to attempt a check or save. The ice melts after 1 minute, although unusually hot or cold temperatures can change this duration at the GM's discretion. Dealing at least 1 point of fire damage to the ice removes it instantly

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Freeze Ammunition
